abilities.name: Redeemer of the Lost
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; that destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

abilities.name: Mass of Doom
abilities.rule: Each time this model’s unit makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[DEVASTATING WOUNDS]** ability.
